title: Magnificent Salem Studio
posting_body: For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>
Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!
Large (1300SFT) converted industrial loft space with exposed brick, polished cement floors, heavy timber construction, central heat & AC, stone counter tops  and in-unit wash/dryer.
1 outdoor parking space and hot water included in rent.
Located in the heart of downtown Salem near many restaurants and shops, the waterfront, and the Peabody Essex Museum.
Walking distance to the commuter train station with only a 30-minute commute to Boston.
Breed and weight restrictions may apply).
*First, last and 1/2 security deposit required *1 year lease term
